name: enterprise-admin_set-github-actions-permissions-enterprise
description:
Sets the GitHub Actions permissions policy for organizations and allowed actions in an enterprise.

You must authenticate using an access token with the `admin:enterprise` scope to use this endpoint.

enterprise.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

allowed-actions.description: The permissions policy that controls the actions that are allowed to run.

enabled-organizations.description: The policy that controls the organizations in the enterprise that are allowed to run GitHub Actions.
